version_description: Easily get 8 pack abs, bigger chest, shoulders, add tattoos etc.

1.Improve the performance when editing muscles and buttocks
2.Optimize the performance when making in-depth adjustments
3.Improve and refine several user-interfaces
4.Add a vast variety of new art assets

-Improve overall editing experience
-Refine the “chest muscle” features
-Add a vast variety of tattoo options
-Minor bug fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Optimized the chest and abs features. Enjoy a better editing experience.
- Updated lots of awesome contents.
- Well, it's time to have fun with this app!!!

- Overall improved the performance
- Updated the interface
- Fixed some small bugs
- Added new contents

If you have any problems, suggestions or ideas, please let us know at bodyapp@alphatech.mobi, we'd love to help you and improve our app.

- Optimized the display method of the comparison between the adjusted photo and original images when it is under the zoom mode.
- Adjusted the selected block of the chest. Improved the display during size changing and moving of the selected area.
- Optimized the muscles’ selected block.
- It's time to wow your friends!
If you have any problems, suggestions or ideas, please let us know at bodyapp@alphatech.mobi, we'd love to help you and improve our app. Thank you!
